segments.text: I observe the water overflowing, the sound of it splashing echoing in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman has a serene expression, completely fixated on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost amusing how oblivious she is to the chaos brewing behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I glance back at the boy, teetering on the stool, and my heart drops.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of him reaching for the cookies makes me tense up; it feels so dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is something I admire, yet it’s overshadowed by my worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl near him, her outstretched palm reminds me of how innocent this moment is, yet how risky it feels.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think how simple joys can sometimes lead to precarious situations.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The chaos inside stands in sharp contrast to the peaceful scene outside the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen, filled with everyday noise, feels like a world about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR
